title: Master Arcanist Ziggs casts power word boom

replies.body: Don't worry son, I am in the same {{item:3020}} with you.

i care
dw rivensmurfs i got you

I haven't played since the start of the season, after the first 10 ranked games. Now when i have the time to play again i think my wallet is going to go into hiding after all the recent skins of my main champs i play..... R.I.P Bank {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

1

I thought of a new game mode for League Of Legends.This game mode is where u get to choose your own abilities of the same kind(q,w,e,r)but they have to be the same letters of another character(you can't have 4q's or 4r's,ect...)so u could have master Yi's  q with fioras r and blitz  knock up and ez's  w,wouldn't that be cool?and each ability u change to that characters figure and get their passive but cool downs stay the same(can't build a tower with sand guys  passive then get another life with ice birds  passive).Please share this on as many LoL forums and pages as u can so we can get the msg to riot :)

1

This skin. So good. Simply don't want to play anyone except Ziggs anymore. :D

Great job.
They should make more skins like that for {{champion:268}} {{champion:35}} and many more

I thought of a new game mode for League Of Legends.This game mode is where u get to choose your own abilities of the same kind(q,w,e,r)but they have to be the same letters of another character(you can't have 4q's or 4r's,ect...)so u could have master Yi's {{champion:11}}  q with fioras {{champion:114}} r and blitz {{champion:53}}  knock up and ez's {{champion:81}} w,wouldn't that be cool?and each ability u change to that characters figure and get their passive but cool downs stay the same(can't build a tower with sand guys {{champion:268}}  passive then get another life with ice birds {{champion:34}}  passive).Please share this on as many LoL forums and pages as u can so we can get the msg to riot :)
His hat in the splash art.....Bloodborne much?
Technically a D&D reference if i'm not mistaken :P
Cause Hearthstone was the first time any spell called a power word was ever used...
Because we needed another ziggs skin
